short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Aliexpress reviews and export them from the Aliexpress page to a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Aliexpress reviews and export them from the Aliexpress page to a CSV file. Elevate your Alexpress experience with the Alexpress Review Exporter browser extension! This powerful tool enhances your ability to query, manage, and export reviews effortlessly, providing a seamless and efficient workflow for users.
